next_steps.step: Improve customer hit rate by focusing on understanding their specific needs and tailoring solutions accordingly to demonstrate value and increase their likelihood of selecting Schneider Electric.
Increase Iberian engagement by assigning a dedicated Iberian-speaking sales representative or involving Iberian-based technical experts to address any regional specific concerns or requirements.

Boost customer activity by proactively reaching out to schedule meetings, demos, or site visits, and provide valuable information or resources to reignite their interest and involvement in the sales process.
